description:
Learn the basics of 3D Animation theory and practice from professional visual effects artist.

Download a free trial of Autodesk Maya from the Autodesk website.

The course covers:

  • Introduction to Visual Effects
  • Introduction to Maya Program
  • Animation Basics
  • Modeling
  • Lighting
  • Shading
  • Texturing
  • Rendering
  • Dynamics (Effects)

A verifiable certificate of completion is available upon completion of this course.

Please let us know if you have any questions! Otherwise, we'll see you inside the course!

Phil & Abhishek
title: AutoDesk Maya: 3D Animations & Visual Effects for Beginners
